name: scraperr
description: Scraperr is a self-hosted metadata fetcher for Plex, Kodi, and Jellyfin that uses various APIs to enrich posters, summaries, and metadata in media libraries.
features: Multi-platform support: Enriches metadata for Plex, Kodi, Jellyfin, and Emby libraries.
Poster collections: Downloads and organizes posters, backdrops, and artwork from multiple sources.
Automated scanning: Monitors library changes and updates metadata automatically.
Custom templates: Apply custom naming and organization templates for consistent metadata.
Quality filtering: Selects highest quality images based on resolution and aspect ratio.
API aggregation: Combines data from TMDB, TVDB, OMDb, and Fanart.tv for comprehensive metadata.
Missing content detection: Identifies media files with incomplete or missing metadata.
Web interface: Manage scraping jobs and review metadata through a modern web UI.
Selective scraping: Choose specific libraries, folders, or items to update.
Metadata backup: Preserves existing metadata before updates for easy rollback.
Performance tuning: Configurable rate limiting and concurrent requests to respect API quotas.
Statistics dashboard: View scraping progress, success rates, and library coverage metrics.
